title: Ex-Editor For 'New York Post' Dies. Wrote: Headless Body In Topless Bar
teaser: Morning Edition remembers the author of one of the most memorable headlines from The New York Post: Headless Body In Topless Bar. Retired editor Vincent Musetto died on Tuesday at age 74
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
